actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to apply to one conservation publication mailed in bulk by each State the lower third class rate applicable to matter mailed in bulk by qualified nonprofit organizations, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Declares that one conservation publication of a State agency which is responsible for the management and conservation of fish and wildlife shall qualify for the reduced postage rates currently in effect for the third-class bulk mail of qualified nonprofit organizations.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 39 of the United States Code to apply to one conservation publication mailed in bulk by each State the lower third class rate applicable to matter mailed in bulk by qualified nonprofit organizations, and for other purposes.
